mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_adminID) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{notice_category}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_contents}, #{notice_adminID})
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_adminID, notice_date, notice_hit from notice where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_category = #{notice_category}, notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_contents = #{notice_contents} where notice_no = #{notice_no}
